当对话指令中的语音播放完毕时调用该事件: This event is called when the voice in the conversation command has finished playing
当对话文本播放中遇到: When the Dialog text is playing
标识后由玩家操作完成后执行的事件: Event to be executed after the player completes the operation after identification
则需要语音和文本都播放完毕: both Voice and Text Need to finish playing
否则只要文本播放完毕: Otherwise as Soon as the Text Finishes Playing
等一小段时间才正在自动跳过: Waiting for a short period of time before the automatically skipping
如果仍然满足跳过的条件的话才真正跳过: if it still fulfill the condition, it can recognize as Real Skipping
因为两秒内可能由于玩家操作跳过了对话或取消掉了自动: Because the Dialog May be Skipped or Canceled auto due to Player Actions Within Two Seconds
我能邀请你一起吗: Can I invite you to join me
早就久仰您的大名了呢: I've heard a lot about you
可以在标题界面的图片鉴赏以及音乐鉴赏中进行查看: Can be viewed in the CG and Music interface
测试制作中如果想要清空图鉴内容: If you want to clear CG and Music Collection during the test production
请使用编辑器菜单选项中的清空游戏存档功能: Please use the 'clear gamesave' in the editor menu
我这是要发现通往新世界的大门了吗: Am I about to discover the door to a new world
请尽情创作您心目中的世界: Please feel free to create your own world
是否来自显示对象: Is it from the display object
否则来自移动对象: Is it from a moving object
记录上一个关联的指令的参数: Record the parameters of the previous associated instruction
被按下时会退出当前焦点: When pressed, it will exit the current focus
请尝试自行通过按键: Please try to press the key by yourself
勾选此项后按钮焦点指令才允许生效: The button focus command can only take effect after this option is checked
用于显示按钮焦点效果以及键盘操作: Used to display button focus effect and keyboard operation
列表组件以及事件命名中设定的按钮焦点皮肤的动画: Animation of list components and button focus skin set in event naming
游戏的系统按键中对应的键盘键位的默认值: The default value of the corresponding keyboard key in the system key of the game
自动选择根容器的第一层子节点中的所有按钮组件作为按键焦点集: Automatically select all button components in the first level child node of the root container as the key focus set
可用于排除通过自动焦点模式获得的按钮: Can be used to exclude buttons obtained through automatic focus mode
创建其下的组件作为按钮焦点时的皮肤: Skin when creating the component under it as the button focus
使用系统预先设置好的焦点皮肤动画效果: Use the focus skin animation effect preset by the system
如果使用系统的退出焦点方式与你的界面逻辑有所冲突: If the exit focus mode of the system conflicts with your interface logic
允许使用快捷键退出当前焦点: Allow using shortcut keys to exit the current focus
勾选此项可用键盘和游戏手柄操作: Check this option to enable keyboard and gamepad operations
在通常情况下勾选该选项后: Under normal circumstances, when this option is checked
鼠标事件制作退出焦点的功能: Mouse event creation exit focus function
当退出时选中上一次的焦点: Select the previous focus when exiting
允许使用快捷键关闭该界面: Allow shortcut keys to close this interface
当关闭时选中上一次的焦点: Select the previous focus when closed
快进已读的情况不允许快进未读到的文本: Fast forwarding of unread text is not allowed in cases where it has already been read
这些参数修改后需要刷新实际图片显示: After modifying these parameters, the actual image display needs to be refreshed
获取上一个关联指令的参数: Get the parameters of the previous associated command
非播放模式下不播放: Do not play in non playback mode
读档时以重启游戏的方式读取: Reading files by restarting the game
该方式可清除当前的游戏内存: This method can clear the current game memory
但玩家需要等待更长的时间: But players need to wait longer
跳过标题界面并静默读取游戏档案: Skip the title interface and silently read game files
读档时强制重启游戏: Force game restart during file reading
以便清除当前内存并重启游戏回到当前的进度: In order to clear the current memory and restart the game to return to the current progress
来卸载不再使用的: To uninstall items that are no longer in use
来销毁不再使用的界面: To destroy the interface that is no longer in use
则会重新加载该界面: Then the interface will be reloaded
时如果一个人物表情动作过多请根据使用场景将该人物拆分多个版本: If a character has too many facial expressions and actions, please split the character into multiple versions according to the usage scenario
否则将会一次性加载所有的表情动作: Otherwise, all emoticons will be loaded at once
请尽量使用合适尺寸的图片: Please try to use images of appropriate size as much as possible
尺寸越大占用的内存和显存则越大: The larger the size, the larger the memory and graphics memory occupied
请在正式发布游戏前使用低端机型测试游戏: Please test the game using a low-end model before officially releasing it
以避免低端机型用户在游玩时出现卡顿: To avoid lagging for low-end users during gameplay
请充分了解各插件的功效和弊端并合理使用: Please fully understand the benefits and drawbacks of each plugin and use it reasonably
游戏可能因为某个作者的插件导致内存占用过高: The game may have excessive memory usage due to the plugin of a certain author
在进入新场景时系统会预加载: The system will preload when entering a new scene
而离开该场景时会卸载: And when leaving this scene, it will be uninstalled
所以请在不适用该图像时确保调用: So please make sure to call when the image is not applicable
可在游戏内使用: Can be used within the game
以便自己根据当前资源利用情况来优化游戏: So that I can optimize the game based on the current resource utilization situation
定期清理不再使用的资源: Regularly clean up resources that are no longer in use
正式发售的游戏若非确定问题来源于游戏引擎: If it is not certain that the problem with the officially released game originates from the game engine
请勿将游戏内的问题直接归结为游戏引擎问题: Do not attribute in-game issues directly to game engine issues
系统会定期清理: The system will regularly clean up
将其卸载而不再占用内存和显存空间: Uninstall it without occupying memory and graphics space anymore
系统通过引用计数方式管理资源: The system manages resources through reference counting
系统会定期清理引用计数为: The system will periodically clean up the reference count to
该指令的预加载资源模式会增加引用计数: The preload resource mode of this instruction will increase the reference count
而卸载资源则会减少引用计数: Unloading resources will reduce the reference count
在预加载资源后如果今后不再使用该资源了请卸载掉该资源: If you no longer use the resource after preloading it, please uninstall it
以免持续占用内存空间: To avoid continuously occupying memory space
查看当前资源的引用计数情况: View the reference count of the current resource
该指令用于优化内存占用: This instruction is used to optimize memory usage
调用该指令将会立刻存档并重启游戏回到当前位置: Calling this command will immediately save and restart the game to return to its current position
利用重启游戏清空当前内存占用: Using game restart to clear current memory usage
当你认为当前资源占用内存过多又不想手动卸载不需要的资源时可利用该指令重新载入游戏: When you think the current resource is occupying too much memory and do not want to manually unload unnecessary resources, you can use this command to reload the game
部分临时效果以及插件可能并未适配存档: Some temporary effects and plugins may not be compatible with archiving
请在需要时以合适的位置插入该指令: Please insert the instruction at the appropriate location when needed
